__e: You've made me feel like a princess with a fine wedding gown and a dowry and such a beautiful, beautiful wedding.
I told her she couldn't look to me for a dowry, and naturally he wouldn't touch her without one.
So, he'll get you and your dowry and he'll take her as well.
The dowry for my marriage with the man you slew!
This is my daughter's jointure, for no more can I demand.
He was part of your ma's dowry. I tell you !
